mapper.select: SELECT distinct o.orderNo, ifnull(u.email, '탈퇴한 유저') as email, c.codeNm as 'deliveryNm' FROM orderInfo o LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON o.insId = u.id INNER JOIN code c ON o.deliveryCd = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'DELIVERY' WHERE o.paymentCd in ('01', '02') ORDER BY o.orderNo desc

SELECT o.orderNo, p.productNm, o.cnt, o.recipient, o.addr, o.phone, o.discountAmt, o.amount, c.codeNm as 'paymentNm', o.deliveryCd, o.orderDt FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.id INNER JOIN code c ON o.paymentCd = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'PAYMENT' WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo} AND o.delDt is null
mapper.update: UPDATE orderInfo SET deliveryCd=#{deliveryCd} WHERE orderNo=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.productNm, p.price, p.filePath FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.productId = p.id AND p.delDt is null LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON c.insId = u.id WHERE c.insId = #{id}
SELECT s.*, cd.codeNm as 'unitNm' FROM sale s INNER JOIN cart c on s.productId = c.productId INNER JOIN code cd on s.unitCd = cd.code AND cd.codeGbn = 'UNIT' WHERE c.insId = #{id};
SELECT c.*, cd.codeNm as 'unitNm' FROM coupon c INNER JOIN code cd ON c.unitCd = cd.code AND cd.codeGbn = 'UNIT' WHERE c.code = #{code}
SELECT distinct orderNo FROM orderInfo WHERE orderNo like CONCAT(#{today},'%') ORDER BY orderNo desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderInfo values(null, #{orderNo}, #{productId}, #{cnt}, #{recipient}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{discountAmt}, #{amount}, #{paymentCd}, '01', now(), #{insId}, now(), null);
mapper.update: UPDATE orderInfo SET paymentCd=#{paymentCd}, deliveryCd=#{deliveryCd} WHERE orderNo=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, c1.codeNm as 'deliveryNm', c2.codeNm as 'paymentNm', p.productNm, p.filePath FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN code c1 ON o.deliveryCd = c1.code AND c1.codeGbn = 'DELIVERY' INNER JOIN code c2 ON o.paymentCd = c2.code AND c2.codeGbn = 'PAYMENT' INNER JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.id WHERE orderNo = #{orderNo};

SELECT distinct o.orderNo, c.codeNm as 'deliveryNm' FROM orderInfo o LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON o.insId = u.id INNER JOIN code c ON o.deliveryCd = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'DELIVERY' WHERE o.insId = #{id} AND paymentCd in ('01', '02') ORDER BY o.orderNo desc;
SELECT o.*, p.productNm FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN product p ON o.productId = p.id WHERE o.orderNo = #{orderNo}
